physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two rows of shophouses, one on each side of the street. Several trishaws and pedestrians can be seen on the streets. Clothes such as tee shirts, shorts, and trousers protrude from the second and third levels of the shophouses.
title_text: Chinatown Singapore Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: mercantile buildings residential structures Chinatowns street scenes land vehicles
